content.part1:
I am a versatile software developer with an attention to flexability, speed and quality. Ambitious problem solver and someone who loves creating cool stuff.

Interested in the entire web-development spectrum, both front and back end. Fan of outdoor activites, TV series and lifting weights.

Currently studying to get a MSc in
content.part2: and a bachelors degree in Computer Science at Umeå University, therefore remote, part time, summer employment or internships are preferred.

content.part1:
I mainly work within web development and have experience with different frameworks for the client and server.

 Worked on larger corporate projects and smaller side-projects where my main goal is always to learn something new.

 A succesfull project is a project where I’m proud to say that I was a part of the process.
